Agender.name: Agender
Agender.description: Agender refers to someone who identifies as having no gender or being gender-neutral.

Aromantic.name: Aromantic
Aromantic.description: Aromantic people experience little or no romantic attraction to others.

Asexual.name: Asexual
Asexual.description: Asexuality is the lack of sexual attraction to others, or low or absent interest in sexual activity.

Bicurious.name: Bicurious
Bicurious.description: Bicurious refers to someone exploring or curious about experiencing attraction to more than one gender.

Demiboy.name: Demiboy
Demiboy.description: A demiboy is someone who partially, but not wholly, identifies as a boy or man.

Demigirl.name: Demigirl
Demigirl.description: A demigirl is someone who partially, but not wholly, identifies as a girl or woman.

Genderqueer.name: Genderqueer
Genderqueer.description: Genderqueer is a broad identity that encompasses gender identities that are not exclusively male or female.

Lesbian.name: Lesbian
Lesbian.description: A lesbian is a woman or feminine-aligned person who is primarily romantically or sexually attracted to other women.

Mlm.name: MLM
Mlm.description: MLM (men loving men) refers to men or masculine-aligned individuals who are romantically or sexually attracted to other men.

Nonbinary.name: Nonbinary
Nonbinary.description: Nonbinary is a gender identity that does not fit within the traditional binary of male or female.

Pansexual.name: Pansexual
Pansexual.description: Pansexuality is the romantic or sexual attraction toward people regardless of their gender identity.

Transgender.name: Transgender
Transgender.description: Transgender refers to individuals whose gender identity differs from the sex they were assigned at birth.
